data.name: VEGA Conflict - Dread Pack (Discounted)
data.detailed_description:
Ready to rule the galaxy with an iron fist? The Dread Pack's your ticket straight to the top:

Dread Battleship (x4) - The massive, cutting edge Dread Battleship truly lives up to its name and is a true force to be reckoned with.

2500 Coins - Providing you with the ability to build upon your base assets with the latest tech and resources. Bonus Gold will really help you make your mark in the sector.

Bonus consumable equipment credits:

- Echo Ray II (x10)
- Energy Resistor III (x4)
- Diffuser Shield II (x4)
- Zynthium IV (x8)
- Focused Optics III (x4)
data.about_the_game:
Ready to rule the galaxy with an iron fist? The Dread Pack's your ticket straight to the top:

Dread Battleship (x4) - The massive, cutting edge Dread Battleship truly lives up to its name and is a true force to be reckoned with.

2500 Coins - Providing you with the ability to build upon your base assets with the latest tech and resources. Bonus Gold will really help you make your mark in the sector.

Bonus consumable equipment credits:

- Echo Ray II (x10)
- Energy Resistor III (x4)
- Diffuser Shield II (x4)
- Zynthium IV (x8)
- Focused Optics III (x4)
data.short_description: Ready to rule the galaxy with an iron fist? Check out the Dread Pack: a one of a kind array of weaponry, resistance tech, and high value gold. The Dread Battleship will allow you to take the fight to your enemies.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Portuguese-Brazil
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP+
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.8GHz, SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible with OS

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7+
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.8GHz, SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible with OS
